div.p: Handpicked NixOS news, updates on (bi-)weekly basis, delivered to your inbox. We are just starting and are looking for help from community.
As everything must start somewhere and let this be our first post on weekly.nixos.org. Enjoy our initial selection of most recent NixOS related links.

blockquote.p: NixOS 16.09 (Flounder) is on it way. Help test it https://github.com/NixOS/nixpkgs/issues/18209

li.p: FrOSCon 2016: NixOS presented by Franz Plets
ZuriHac 2016: Functional Programming at LumiGuide presented by Bas van Dijk
Nix Â±Cabal presented by James Earl Douglas
Hardening Compiler Flags for NixOS blog post by Mayflower GmbH
NixOS on Brightbox Cloud blog post by Brightbox Systems Ltd
Reflections On NixOS blog post by an Denhardt
An extended self-adaptive deployment framework for service-oriented systems blog post by Sander van der Burg
tuebix blog post by Joachim Schiele

blockquote.p: London Nixos Meetup at CodeNode, London, UK NixOS contributor obadz will talk about his recent addition: NIXOS_LUSTRATE
DevOps Autumn 2016 sprint at Flying Circus Internet Operations GmbH, Halle, Germany

div.p: Write us if you are looking for some skilled Nix magicians.
Since we need to start somewhere we are listing all new contributors since August 1, 2016.
TODO: invite to contribute, also mention this blg is written in Nix, how kewl is that!
Thank you for reading this. Since nobody is perfect we might forget something or simply misspell it. Let us know if we messed it up.
